effect:
Your champion gets +2 level until end of turn.

[Class Bonus] ***Harmonize*** — If you've activated a Melody card this turn, draw a card.
effect_raw:
Your champion gets +2 level until end of turn.

[Class Bonus] Harmonize — If you've activated a Melody card this turn, draw a card.
flavor: Melodies sound ever more beautiful with strong accompaniment.
name: Empowering Harmony
effect_html: Your champion gets +2 level until end of turn.Class Bonus Harmonize — If you've activated a Melody card this turn, draw a card.

editions.effect: **Glimpse 2**. Put a **preparation** counter on your champion.
editions.effect_raw: Glimpse 2. Put a preparation counter on your champion.
editions.effect_html: Glimpse 2. Put a preparation counter on your champion.

effect: **Glimpse 2**. Put a **preparation** counter on your champion. *(To **glimpse**, look at that many cards from the top of your deck. Put those cards back on the top or on the bottom of your deck in any order.)*
effect_raw: Glimpse 2. Put a preparation counter on your champion. (To glimpse, look at that many cards from the top of your deck. Put those cards back on the top or on the bottom of your deck in any order.)
flavor: No such thing as too much preperation.
name: Strategic Planning
